metadata.title: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator
metadata.subtitle: Master Microsoft 365 Security Operations
metadata.description: Become an expert in Microsoft 365 security administration, mastering threat protection, data governance, and security operations for enterprise environments.
prerequisites: Knowledge of networking and cloud security

overview.summary: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator training prepares you for the SC-200 certification by mastering Microsoft 365 security features, threat protection, data governance, and security operations in enterprise environments.
objectives: Monitor and respond to security incidents
overview.targetAudience: Security administrators, IT professionals, and compliance officers who manage Microsoft 365 security in enterprise organizations.

modules.title: Microsoft 365 Threat Protection
objectives: Set up Microsoft Defender for Office 365

sections.content:
Comprehensive Threat Protection

Microsoft 365 provides integrated threat protection across identity, email, endpoints, and cloud applications to defend against modern cyber threats.

labs.title: Threat Protection Lab

modules.title: Security Operations and Monitoring
modules.description: Master security operations and incident response

sections.content:
Security Operations Center

The Microsoft 365 security center provides unified visibility and control over security across all Microsoft 365 services and workloads.

labs.title: Security Operations Lab

certification.name: Microsoft Certified: Security Administrator Associate
certification.description: Demonstrate expertise in implementing, managing, and monitoring security and compliance solutions using Microsoft 365 and Azure AD
skillsMeasured: Implement and manage compliance and device management (15-20%)
Implement and manage identity and access management (20-25%)
Implement data loss prevention and information protection (10-15%)

faq.question: What Microsoft 365 licenses are required?
faq.answer: The course covers features that require Microsoft 365 E5 or equivalent licenses. We provide access to a demo environment for hands-on labs.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a highly technical course covering advanced security concepts and configurations. Prior security or IT administration experience is recommended.

faq.question: What security tools are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers Microsoft Defender suite, Azure AD security features, compliance center, and security operations tools.

faq.question: Will I learn about incident response?
faq.answer: Yes, incident management and response is a key component of the course, including automated investigation and remediation features.
